Yadav questioned the Election Commission's role, alleging possible forged signatures and deliberate facilitation of duplicate registrations for BJP supporters. The Election Commission refuted Yadav's claims, deeming the presented EPIC as fake and demanding its submission.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/sir-row-tejashwi-yadav-claims-bihar-deputy-cm-has-two-epic-numbers-asks-if-ec-will-send-separate-notices/articleshow/123214776.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/sir-row-tejashwi-yadav-claims-bihar-deputy-cm-has-two-epic-numbers-asks-if-ec-will-send-separate-notices/articleshow/123214776.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 10 Aug 2025 12:47:57 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="35734" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123214990,imgsize-35734.cms"/></item><item><title>Watch: PM Modi launches 3 Vande Bharat Express trains, Bengaluru Metro's yellow line</title><description><![CDATA[Prime Minister Narendra Modi inaugurated three Vande Bharat Express trains from Bengaluru, connecting Bengaluru to Belagavi, Amritsar to Sri Mata Vaishno Devi Katra, and Nagpur to Pune. He toured the Vande Bharat Express, interacting with schoolchildren. Additionally, PM Modi inaugurated Bangalore Metro's Yellow Line, expanding the city's metro network. He also laid the foundation stone for Bangalore Metro Phase 3.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/watch-pm-modi-launches-three-vande-bharat-express-trains-yellow-line-of-bengaluru-metro-key-details/articleshow/123215089.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/watch-pm-modi-launches-three-vande-bharat-express-trains-yellow-line-of-bengaluru-metro-key-details/articleshow/123215089.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 10 Aug 2025 13:07:38 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="4077428" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123215214,imgsize-4077428.cms"/></item><item><title>Boy's 150km trek with severed arm exposes bonded labour, rescued in Haryana</title><description><![CDATA[A 15-year-old bonded labour survivor from Bihar is recovering in Haryana after a horrific ordeal. He was found walking along a road with a severed arm, narrating a tale of being lured with a job promise, then held captive at a dairy farm where he lost his arm in an accident.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/patna/kishanganj-boys-150km-trek-with-severed-arm-exposes-bonded-labour/articleshow/123208762.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/patna/kishanganj-boys-150km-trek-with-severed-arm-exposes-bonded-labour/articleshow/123208762.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 23:15:49 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>ADWITIYA DEB</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="129777" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123213407,imgsize-129777.cms"/></item><item><title>Ignored villagers’ warning: UP man heading home for Rakhi swept away</title><description><![CDATA[In a tragic incident in Bijnor, a 35-year-old man drowned after being swept away by strong currents on a flooded road. Neetu Singh, who had come from Haryana for Rakshabandhan, was returning from Sahaspur when he attempted to cross the waterlogged stretch near Jairampur village, ignoring warnings from locals.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/meerut/ignored-villagers-warning-up-man-heading-home-for-rakhi-swept-away-on-flooded-road-strong-current-made-him-lose-balance-and-fall/articleshow/123213587.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/meerut/ignored-villagers-warning-up-man-heading-home-for-rakhi-swept-away-on-flooded-road-strong-current-made-him-lose-balance-and-fall/articleshow/123213587.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 10 Aug 2025 09:02:28 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>HARVEER DABAS</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="207751" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123215243,imgsize-207751.cms"/></item><item><title>'My mistake': Rohit’s childhood coach shares how he discovered the batter inside him</title><description><![CDATA[Rohit Sharma's journey to becoming a destructive opener almost took a different turn. His childhood coach, Dinesh Lad, initially saw him as a promising off-spinner. Lad discovered Rohit's batting talent by chance when he saw him batting in school. Impressed by his skills, Lad promoted him to open, where he scored 140 runs.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/cricket-that-was-my-mistake-rohit-sharmas-childhood-coach-shares-how-he-discovered-the-batter-inside-the-future-india-captain/articleshow/123215713.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/cricket-that-was-my-mistake-rohit-sharmas-childhood-coach-shares-how-he-discovered-the-batter-inside-the-future-india-captain/articleshow/123215713.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 10 Aug 2025 14:15:48 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="23190" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123215856,imgsize-23190.cms"/></item><item><title>FASTag Annual Pass to go live on August 15: Fee, validity, number of trips allowed and other details</title><description><![CDATA[India's FASTag system is getting an upgrade. The National Highways Authority of India will launch the FASTag Annual Pass on Independence Day. This pass costs Rs 3,000. It allows up to 200 toll crossings or a year of travel for private vehicles. The goal is to reduce congestion and speed up toll transactions.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/fastag-annual-pass-to-go-live-on-august-15-fee-validity-number-of-trips-allowed-and-other-important-details/articleshow/123214930.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/fastag-annual-pass-to-go-live-on-august-15-fee-validity-number-of-trips-allowed-and-other-important-details/articleshow/123214930.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 10 Aug 2025 12:14:42 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="29804" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123214934,imgsize-29804.cms"/></item><item><title>College student assaulted by seniors in Andhra, attackers tried to give electric shock</title><description><![CDATA[In Palnadu district, a first-year intermediate student at a BC hostel in Dachepalli was brutally assaulted by senior students. The disturbing incident, filmed and circulated on social media, prompted police action. Authorities have arrested three of the five accused involved in the attack, which included kicking and attempted electric shock.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/vijayawada/kicked-repeatedly-as-he-pleaded-for-mercy-college-student-assaulted-by-seniors-in-andhra-pradesh-attackers-tried-to-give-electric-shock-3-arrested/articleshow/123215428.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/vijayawada/kicked-repeatedly-as-he-pleaded-for-mercy-college-student-assaulted-by-seniors-in-andhra-pradesh-attackers-tried-to-give-electric-shock-3-arrested/articleshow/123215428.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 10 Aug 2025 13:30:35 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>MADHU RASALA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="31486" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123215533,imgsize-31486.cms"/></item><item><title>21-year-old from Chhattisgarh gets surprise calls from Kohli and AB de Villiers – how it happened</title><description><![CDATA[In Chhattisgarh, Manish Bisi was accidentally given cricketer Rajat Patidar’s old number, leading to calls from Virat Kohli and AB de Villiers. Mistaken for Patidar, he thought it was a prank until police intervened and returned the SIM. The 21-year-old called the experience unforgettable and shared that he hopes to meet Patidar.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/bizarre-21-year-old-from-chhattisgarh-gets-surprise-calls-from-virat-kohli-and-ab-de-villiers-heres-how-it-happened/articleshow/123215122.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/bizarre-21-year-old-from-chhattisgarh-gets-surprise-calls-from-virat-kohli-and-ab-de-villiers-heres-how-it-happened/articleshow/123215122.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 10 Aug 2025 12:36:54 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="60834" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123215401,imgsize-60834.cms"/></item><item><title>Chess | Praggnanandhaa decodes Magnus Carlsen's greatness - 'He’s just universally strong'</title><description><![CDATA[R Praggnanandhaa, who has challenged Magnus Carlsen, shared insights into the World No. 1's greatness, highlighting Carlsen's exceptional intuition and ability to consistently make optimal moves. Praggnanandhaa emphasized Carlsen's mental fortitude, noting his relentless fighting spirit and resourcefulness in every game.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/chess/chess-praggnanandhaa-decodes-magnus-carlsens-greatness-hes-just-universally-strong/articleshow/123215864.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/chess/chess-praggnanandhaa-decodes-magnus-carlsens-greatness-hes-just-universally-strong/articleshow/123215864.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 10 Aug 2025 14:21:33 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="44214" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123215889,imgsize-44214.cms"/></item><item><title>‘People are going to walk in the door &…,’ says AI assurance leader at PwC on junior hires</title><description><![CDATA[PwC is reshaping its training programs as AI transforms the accounting industry. Junior accountants will quickly assume manager-level responsibilities, overseeing AI systems that handle routine tasks. The firm is emphasizing fundamental audit principles, critical thinking, and advanced analytical skills for new hires to adapt to the evolving landscape.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/people-are-going-to-walk-in-the-door-and-almost-instantaneously-become-says-jenn-kosar-ai-assurance-leader-at-pwc-on-junior-hires/articleshow/123215435.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/people-are-going-to-walk-in-the-door-and-almost-instantaneously-become-says-jenn-kosar-ai-assurance-leader-at-pwc-on-junior-hires/articleshow/123215435.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 10 Aug 2025 13:16:25 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="20208" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123215441,imgsize-20208.cms"/></item><item><title>Human trafficking network busted: Girl sold twice for marriage rescued in Rajasthan</title><description><![CDATA[The CBI rescued a minor girl from Pali, Rajasthan, nearly two years after she disappeared from West Bengal, suspecting a human trafficking network. The Calcutta High Court transferred the case to the CBI after local efforts failed.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/jaipur/cbi-rescues-missing-west-bengal-girl-from-pali-five-arrested-in-trafficking-case/articleshow/123210577.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/jaipur/cbi-rescues-missing-west-bengal-girl-from-pali-five-arrested-in-trafficking-case/articleshow/123210577.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 10 Aug 2025 01:07:15 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="10842" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123213247,imgsize-10842.cms"/></item><item><title>CBSE to introduce open-book exams: Class 9 rollout from 2026-27</title><description><![CDATA[The CBSE has approved the introduction of open-book assessments for Class 9 students from the 2026-27 academic session. The decision follows a successful pilot study and aligns with the NEP 2020 and NCFSE 2023, aiming to shift from rote memorisation to application-based learning. These assessments will be part of internal exams in core subjects. A similar model, OTBA, was previously introduced in 2014 but discontinued in 2017-18 due to limited impact on critical thinking.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/news/cbse-to-introduce-open-book-exams-for-class-9-from-2026-27-under-nep-guidelines/articleshow/123214545.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/news/cbse-to-introduce-open-book-exams-for-class-9-from-2026-27-under-nep-guidelines/articleshow/123214545.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 10 Aug 2025 11:31:38 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>SANJAY SHARMA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="131390" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123214552,imgsize-131390.cms"/></item><item><title>Chess | Pragg decodes Carlsen's greatness - 'He’s just universally strong'</title><description><![CDATA[Nayara Energy, formerly Essar Oil, faces significant challenges due to sanctions following EU's sanctions on Russian ooil. These sanctions impact exports, shipping, and finances. While shifting focus to the domestic market offers some relief, it affects profitability.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/symbol-of-india-russia-ties-takes-a-hard-hit-how-russia-backed-indian-refinery-nayara-energy-is-navigating-a-perfect-storm-big-hurdles-challenge-growth/articleshow/123214146.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/symbol-of-india-russia-ties-takes-a-hard-hit-how-russia-backed-indian-refinery-nayara-energy-is-navigating-a-perfect-storm-big-hurdles-challenge-growth/articleshow/123214146.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 10 Aug 2025 13:01:07 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="83846" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123215237,imgsize-83846.cms"/></item><item><title>Nvidia CEO checks salaries of company's 42,000 employees; says: It's a strategy that…</title><description><![CDATA[Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang personally reviews the compensation of all 42,000 employees monthly, utilizing machine learning to optimize the process. He dismisses rumors of secret stock options, emphasizing generous compensation for all workers. Huang believes in prioritizing employee well-being, which he feels drives overall success. This strategy has significantly benefited Nvidia's leadership, creating billionaires within his management team.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/nvidia-ceo-jensen-huang-checks-salaries-of-companys-entire-42000-employees-says-its-a-strategy-that-/articleshow/123194662.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/nvidia-ceo-jensen-huang-checks-salaries-of-companys-entire-42000-employees-says-its-a-strategy-that-/articleshow/123194662.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 23:44:23 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="43658" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123194569,imgsize-43658.cms"/></item><item><title>‘RM said enough is enough’: Army chief recalls day after Pahalgam attack</title><description><![CDATA[Army Chief General Upendra Dwivedi shared details about Operation Sindoor. Air Chief Marshal AP Singh revealed the destruction of Pakistani assets. He credited the government's clear political will. The operation galvanised the nation.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/we-played-chess-army-chief-says-saw-political-clarity-during-op-sindoor-recalls-tactics-used/articleshow/123213383.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/we-played-chess-army-chief-says-saw-political-clarity-during-op-sindoor-recalls-tactics-used/articleshow/123213383.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 10 Aug 2025 08:37:52 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1826254" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123213444,imgsize-1826254.cms"/></item><item><title>'To enhance its reputation’: Bangladesh hires ex-ICC anti-corruption head</title><description><![CDATA[The Bangladesh Cricket Board has appointed Alex Marshall, the former head of the ICC’s Anti-Corruption Unit, as a consultant for one year to strengthen its anti-corruption efforts. This decision comes in response to numerous corruption complaints and aims to enhance vigilance and training within the BCB's ACU.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/to-enhance-its-reputation-bangladesh-cricket-board-hires-former-icc-anti-corruption-unit-head-alex-marshall-to-boost-vigilance/articleshow/123215124.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/to-enhance-its-reputation-bangladesh-cricket-board-hires-former-icc-anti-corruption-unit-head-alex-marshall-to-boost-vigilance/articleshow/123215124.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 10 Aug 2025 12:43:13 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="17106" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123215177,imgsize-17106.cms"/></item><item><title>Delhi shocker: One dead after speeding Thar hits man; liquor bottle found in vehicle</title><description><![CDATA[A tragic accident near 11 Murti on Mother Teresa Road in New Delhi claimed one life and left another person injured. Delhi Police confirmed that a vehicle struck two individuals, leading to the fatality. The driver has been detained, and authorities discovered a liquor bottle inside the car.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/delhi/delhi-shocker-one-dead-another-injured-in-car-crash-near-11-murti-liquor-bottle-found-in-vehicle/articleshow/123214169.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/delhi/delhi-shocker-one-dead-another-injured-in-car-crash-near-11-murti-liquor-bottle-found-in-vehicle/articleshow/123214169.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 10 Aug 2025 10:41:31 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI CITY DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="934691" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123214222,imgsize-934691.cms"/></item><item><title>RCB captain’s old SIM lands with Chhattisgarh youth, answers calls from Virat Kohli</title><description><![CDATA[A youth in Gariaband received Rajat Patidar's re-allotted mobile number. He then started getting calls from Virat Kohli and AB de Villiers. The youth initially thought it was a prank. Patidar contacted the Madhya Pradesh Cyber Cell when he could not access his number. Police recovered the SIM and returned it to Patidar. The cricket fans called the incident unforgettable.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/raipur/dialling-destiny-rcb-captain-rajat-patidars-old-sim-lands-with-chhattisgarh-youth-answers-calls-from-virat-kohli-ab-de-villiers/articleshow/123214914.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/raipur/dialling-destiny-rcb-captain-rajat-patidars-old-sim-lands-with-chhattisgarh-youth-answers-calls-from-virat-kohli-ab-de-villiers/articleshow/123214914.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 10 Aug 2025 12:19:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>PARTHA BEHERA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1732686" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123215165,imgsize-1732686.cms"/></item><item><title>‘Lost love’ scam: Mumbai cops nab Rajasthan duo over promise to reunite lovers</title><description><![CDATA[Mumbai police busted two fraudsters from Rajasthan who exploited vulnerable individuals seeking love reunions through an online scam. Posing as spiritual gurus, they convinced a South Mumbai woman's daughter to pay for rituals with gold and cash. The crime branch traced the suspects to Sri Ganganagar, recovering stolen property worth Rs 16.2 lakh.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/mumbai/mumbai-crime-branch-nab-rajasthan-duo-running-online-lost-love-scam-16-lakh-worth-of-gold-cash-recovered/articleshow/123206724.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/mumbai/mumbai-crime-branch-nab-rajasthan-duo-running-online-lost-love-scam-16-lakh-worth-of-gold-cash-recovered/articleshow/123206724.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 19:54:55 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>AHMED ALI</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="44262" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123206723,imgsize-44262.cms"/></item><item><title>'RR has meant the world to me': Samson breaks silence amid IPL trade rumours</title><description><![CDATA[Sanju Samson expressed deep gratitude for Rajasthan Royals amid speculation about his future with the franchise. Recalling his early days, Samson credited RR for providing him a platform and unwavering support. Despite leading the team to the 2022 final, IPL 2025 posed challenges as he missed matches due to injury.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/ipl/top-stories/ipl-rajasthan-royals-has-meant-the-world-to-me-sanju-samson-breaks-silence-amid-trade-rumours/articleshow/123214719.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/ipl/top-stories/ipl-rajasthan-royals-has-meant-the-world-to-me-sanju-samson-breaks-silence-amid-trade-rumours/articleshow/123214719.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 10 Aug 2025 11:54:58 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="68662" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123214768,imgsize-68662.cms"/></item><item><title>'Voter fraud', SIR row: Kharge to host dinner for INDIA bloc MPs; what's on agenda?</title><description><![CDATA[Congress leader Mallikarjun Kharge is set to host a dinner for INDIA bloc MPs amidst escalating concerns over alleged electoral roll manipulation in Bihar and accusations of poll rigging. Shubman Gill also praised Siraj's unwavering spirit, highlighting his crucial role in India's thrilling series-levelling victory.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-thank-you-sir-mohammed-siraj-pens-emotional-response-to-sachin-tendulkar/articleshow/123215066.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-thank-you-sir-mohammed-siraj-pens-emotional-response-to-sachin-tendulkar/articleshow/123215066.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 10 Aug 2025 12:39:25 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="59462" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123215056,imgsize-59462.cms"/></item><item><title>Man carries pistol to threaten sister’s husband on Raksha Bandhan, held</title><description><![CDATA[On Rakshabandhan, Ahmedabad police arrested a 23-year-old man, Bharwad, for allegedly planning to confront his brother-in-law with a country-made pistol and eight cartridges. Police intercepted him based on a tip-off, recovering the weapon and ammunition, and are investigating the source of the firearm.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/ahmedabad/brothers-rakshabandhan-plan-confront-sisters-husband-with-gun/articleshow/123210390.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/ahmedabad/brothers-rakshabandhan-plan-confront-sisters-husband-with-gun/articleshow/123210390.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 10 Aug 2025 00:42:53 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="49148" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123213112,imgsize-49148.cms"/></item><item><title>'She bewitched me’: Tamil Nadu man kills ex-wife, buries body in forest; arrested</title><description><![CDATA[In a shocking incident, Madan, a 42-year-old car driver, has been arrested for allegedly murdering his former wife, Laila Kumari, in Tiruvallur. Following a missing person report filed by Laila's mother, Madan surrendered to the police.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/chennai/man-murders-former-wife-buries-body-in-forest-nabbed/articleshow/123210009.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/chennai/man-murders-former-wife-buries-body-in-forest-nabbed/articleshow/123210009.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 10 Aug 2025 00:16:15 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>A SELVARAJ</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="912397" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123214508,imgsize-912397.cms"/></item><item><title>Wobble Trouble! Unchecked development in hazard-prone zones must stop.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/dehradun/705-deaths-in-10-yrs-multiple-studies-warn-of-flash-floods-emerging-as-major-killer-in-ukhand/articleshow/123206705.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/dehradun/705-deaths-in-10-yrs-multiple-studies-warn-of-flash-floods-emerging-as-major-killer-in-ukhand/articleshow/123206705.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 19:54:53 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GAURAV TALWAR</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="36182" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123213950,imgsize-36182.cms"/></item><item><title>Army troops launch anti-terror operation in Kishtwar; gunfire exchanged</title><description><![CDATA[In the Kishtwar region of Jammu and Kashmir, a gunfight erupted between security forces and terrorists on Sunday. Fans cheered and captured the moment, highlighting the crossover of cricket and cinema.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/rohit-sharma-on-the-big-screen-movie-theatre-erupts-in-celebration-for-indias-odi-captain-watch/articleshow/123213347.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/rohit-sharma-on-the-big-screen-movie-theatre-erupts-in-celebration-for-indias-odi-captain-watch/articleshow/123213347.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 10 Aug 2025 08:54:37 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="70678" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123213497,imgsize-70678.cms"/></item><item><title>Haunted by 'ghosts of Balakot', IAF chief comes armed with proof - see news pics</title><description><![CDATA[In retaliation to the Pahalgam killings, the Indian Air Force (IAF) released compelling evidence of Operation Sindoor, showcasing precision airstrikes deep inside Pakistan. IAF chief Amar Preet Singh presented visual proof of the destruction of key military and terror infrastructure, including the Nur Khan Airbase, JeM headquarters in Bahawalpur, and LeT headquarters in Muridke.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/pakistani-terror-sites-to-airbases-haunted-by-ghosts-of-balakot-iaf-chief-comes-armed-with-proof-on-operation-sindoor-see-news-pics/articleshow/123207228.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/pakistani-terror-sites-to-airbases-haunted-by-ghosts-of-balakot-iaf-chief-comes-armed-with-proof-on-operation-sindoor-see-news-pics/articleshow/123207228.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2025 21:53:14 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="995238" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123207584,imgsize-995238.cms"/></item><item><title>'It’s embedded in mind': Karthik reveals why 'keepers read wrist spin better</title><description><![CDATA[Dinesh Karthik shared insights on playing wrist spinners like Rashid Khan, emphasising wicketkeepers' advantage due to familiarity and lower body strength. He noted their proficiency in sweep shots and ability to pick cues effectively. Karthik highlighted Sanju Samson as the only wicketkeeper-batter among top performers against Rashid Khan, adding that flat-batted slog sweeps are crucial for negating spin.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/subconsciously-its-embedded-in-mind-dinesh-karthik-reveals-why-wicketkeepers-read-wrist-spin-better/articleshow/123213221.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/subconsciously-its-embedded-in-mind-dinesh-karthik-reveals-why-wicketkeepers-read-wrist-spin-better/articleshow/123213221.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 10 Aug 2025 07:55:50 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="64706" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123213224,imgsize-64706.cms"/></item><item><title>Seven superclouds: Giant gas neighbours of our solar system discovered</title><description><![CDATA[Astronomers have identified seven massive superclouds of gas near our solar system, reshaping our understanding of interstellar space. These structures, thousands of light-years across, are potential star birthplaces, possibly formed from the Milky Way's spiral arms. The discovery, enabled by advanced mapping, reveals a galactic framework influencing star formation and galactic evolution, opening new avenues for astronomical research.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/science/seven-superclouds-giant-gas-neighbours-of-our-solar-system-discovered/articleshow/123208217.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/science/seven-superclouds-giant-gas-neighbours-of-our-solar-system-discovered/articleshow/123208217.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 10 Aug 2025 07:00:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SCIENCE DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="40458" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123208209,imgsize-40458.cms"/></item><item><title>IPL | ‘How did it feel getting smashed by a 14-year-old?’ – R Ashwin shares</title><description><![CDATA[R Ashwin lauded Vaibhav Suryavanshi, a 14-year-old batting sensation, sharing an anecdote from an IPL match where Suryavanshi impressed with his composure and shot selection against Ashwin's bowling. Ashwin recounted Jos Buttler and Jofra Archer's amazement at Suryavanshi's talent. Sanju Samson also praised the young player's consistent hitting and quality strokes during the IPL season.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/how-did-it-feel-getting-smashed-by-a-14-year-old-r-ashwin-reveals-england-players-banter-over-vaibhav-suryavanshi/articleshow/123213321.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/how-did-it-feel-getting-smashed-by-a-14-year-old-r-ashwin-reveals-england-players-banter-over-vaibhav-suryavanshi/articleshow/123213321.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 10 Aug 2025 08:19:52 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="175056" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123213340,imgsize-175056.cms"/></item><item><title>'Ukrainians will not give their land': Zelenskyy vows to block 'second partition attempt'</title><description><![CDATA[Volodymyr Zelenskyy accused Vladimir Putin of attempting to legitimize the occupation of Ukrainian territories under the guise of peace negotiations. Zelenskyy criticized the planned Trump-Putin summit in Alaska, asserting that decisions made without Ukraine's involvement are detrimental to peace. Meanwhile, drone strikes in Kherson and Zaporizhzhia resulted in casualties, while Russia claimed to have intercepted numerous Ukrainian drones.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/europe/everyone-can-clearly-see-putins-tactics-zelenskyy-says-russia-trying-to-legalise-occupation-vows-to-block-ukraines-partition/articleshow/123213006.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/europe/everyone-can-clearly-see-putins-tactics-zelenskyy-says-russia-trying-to-legalise-occupation-vows-to-block-ukraines-partition/articleshow/123213006.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 10 Aug 2025 07:01:57 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="696082" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123213015,imgsize-696082.cms"/></item></channel></rss>
